description:
This trail includes GPS data and will take you to the summit of Mount Seymour. Click on download GPS to see a mini-map. 

Along the way, you will pass the first and second pump. There are BC Parks orange bamboo poles which lead to the first pump. The descent from the second peak to the summit is quite treacherous and crampons are recommended. The views from all three peaks are beautiful on a clear day.

See also this trailpeak entry for Seymour
directions: Take Mount Seymour Parkway to the ski hill parking area. Proceed northwest to the far end of the parking lot. The trail begins about 50 meters north.
title: Mt. Seymour Summit
